mapper.update:
select
case when stage.trx_mode = 'H' then 'INVOICE' ELSE 'CREDIT' end as line_of_business,
case when stage.trx_mode = 'H' then stage.assignment ELSE case when (stage.clear_doc = NULL or stage.clear_doc = '') then stage.assignment ELSE stage.clear_doc end end as invoice_no,
case when stage.trx_mode = 'H' then stage.assignment ELSE case when (stage.clear_doc = NULL or stage.clear_doc = '') then stage.assignment ELSE stage.clear_doc end end as payment_reference
from vendor_invoice_load stage where stage.doc_type in ('PC','GL', 'RE')
